room_title: Escape room "Taken" by Xscape! Live Escape Games in Morgantown
review: Had an amazing time escaping from the Taken room! Definitely an excellent team building environment with lots of fun for all!!! We will be talking about this for a long time. Can't wait to try a new escape room!

room_title: Escape room "Taken" by Xscape! Live Escape Games in Morgantown
review: We came, we saw and we conquered! This is a great group outing. The facility is clean, comfortable and trendy. The escape room (Taken) was so cleverly designed and incorporated challenging puzzles. Lots of humor and appropriately placed music made the experience even more entertaining! Our group loved it! Lots of laughs and even some dancing!

room_title: Escape room "Taken" by Xscape! Live Escape Games in Morgantown
review: We had an amazing time escaping from the “Taken” themed room. Thank you Ryan for making it so much fun!

room_title: Escape room "Taken" by Xscape! Live Escape Games in Morgantown
review: Our group of 8 had a blast at playing Taken and we won! Definitely will be back soon!

room_title: Escape room "Taken" by Xscape! Live Escape Games in Morgantown
review: First escape room experience, and it was a blast! We did the “Taken” game - the room setup and challenge puzzles were so well thought out. It is a great group activity, and we can’t wait to play another one! Eric, the staff, was incredibly nice and helpful and made it really fun and exciting.
